Implemented validateTransactionTypeWithAtps() method in RateServiceImpl class, added new validators to createRateCatalog() method, added new parameters to createRate() method, refactored JUnit tests in RateServiceTest class to address the above changes.
Removed unused class variables from ThirdPartyPlanModel class.
Fixed the line ending characters in ksa_test_data_dml.sql
Changed KSSA_TP_PLAN ID value from 50050 to 1 not to conflict with the numbers generated by the sequence when running JUnit tests.

Together with Paul redesigned Account Blocking service, implemented the following methods in AccountBlockingService: AccountBlockOverride createAccountBlockOverride(String ruleName, String accountId, Date expirationDate, String reason), enableAccountBlock(), disableAccountBlock(), removed AccountBlock and AccountBlockDescriptor classes, changed the properties of AccountBlockDescriptor entity and added a reference to Rule class, added "isBlockingEnabled" property to Account class and renamed "getIsKimAccount" to "getKimAccount", corrected javadoc comments in BrmService and DroolsServiceImpl classes.

Implemented getThirdPartyPlanMember(Long thirdPartyPlanId, String accountId) method in ThirdPartyTransferService, modified Permission enum by adding new/removing unused permission constants, made ThirdPartyPlanMember and ThirdPartyTransferDetail classes extend AccountIdAware mapped superclass, refactored reverseThirdPartyTransfer() and generateThirdPartyTransfer() methods in ThirdPartyTransferServiceImpl class, added new assertions and unit test cases to ThirdPartyTransferServiceTest class, testing/debugging.

Removed unused Apache commons-logging to prevent the warning message coming from KRAD: 31 Aug 2013 15:24:27,562 WARN org.kuali.rice.krad.uif.util.CloneUtils - Exception during field cloning (using original object value). Field: class com.sigmasys.kuali.ksa.krad.helper.SettingsHelper.logger(interface org.apache.commons.logging.Log) java.lang.InstantiationException: org.apache.commons.logging.impl.SLF4JLocationAwareLog

Refactored, removed unused Apache commons-logging (that causes the KRAD cloning warning) from KSA view helper classes including BatchRefundHelper, PaymentPlanHelper, TransactionHelper and TransactionTypeHelper.
Refactored the method createPotentialRefundList() of AccountRefundController class, added javadoc comments, fixed NullPointerException and removed unused code constructions.
Implemented AccountBlockedException classes, inherited it from PermissionDeniedException. It is supposed to be primarily used by AccountBlockingService functionality.
Initial implementation of checkBlock(String accountId, Permission permission, Map<String, Object> attributes) method in AccountBlockingService, refactored Account and AccountBlockedException classes.
As part of KSA-238 JIRA ticket "Org Names in Search" added "left outer join" for retrieving the accounts with Org Names to the generic account search query.
Refactored the generic account JPQL query GET_FULL_ACCOUNTS_JOIN
Renamed "personName" to "contact" in GET_FULL_ACCOUNTS_JOIN query
Implemented getService(), getAtpService() and getHoldService() methods in BrmContext class

As part of KSA-286 JIRA ticket refactored QuickViewController class, used getOutstandingBalance() of AccountService, removed "dueBalance" and "outstandingBalance" properties from ChargeableAccount JPA entity, made the corresponding changes to ksa_create_ddl.sql and ksa_test_data_dml.sql
Modified the JPQL query in checkForRefund() method in RefundService, added TemporalType.DATE to fromDate/toDate query parameters.
Made use of the same JPQL conditions in getFullAccount(String userId) and getFullAccounts() methods to fetch Org Names in them both. Refactored Account class.
Refactoring, cleanup
Refactored getOutstandingBalance(), getDueBalance() and getFutureBalance() methods as part of KSA-286 JIRA ticket.
Added an AccountBlockingService reference to PermissionUtils class, implemented checkPermission(Permission permission, Map<String, Object> attributes) method.
Refactored and cleaned up BiographicController class
Refactored and included additional logging into BatchRefundController and GeneralLedgerController classes
Refactored ReportReconciliationController class
Made use of TransactionService's getTransactionsByGlTransactionId() method in GeneralLedgerController class to have all Transaction associations pre-fetched in the view.
Optimized transaction management, refactored KsbConfigurer and TransactionManagerHelper classes.
Upgraded Atomikos from 3.8.0 to 3.9.0.M1 version
Fixed and refactored getUnallocatedAmount() method in TransactionUtils class.

Modified createAllocation() logic according to the new allocation functionality (unallocated amount is always greater than or equal to 0) in TransactionServiceImpl class, overloaded getUserId() method in UserSessionManager and used it in multiple places, added Account Blocking "when" conditions to ksa.dsl, added new method to AccountBlockingService and its implementation, changed JUnit tests.
Fixed "can allocate" logic in createAllocation() method, refactored classes: PaymentServiceImpl, TransactionServiceImpl, FeeManagementServiceTest and PaymentServiceTest.

Implemented KSA-specific HoldService and AtpService interfaces, created HoldServiceDecorator class, added a new HoldService bean definition to ks-beans.xml, replaced the references to Hold and ATP services throughout the code including the presentation and business tiers, added "blockNames", "transactionTypeIds", "atpIds", "permissionNames", "holdIssueNames" global variables to BRM context, refactored and changed the signatures of checkBlock() methods in AccountBlockingService, modified the Account Blocking section of ksa.dsl and PermissionUtils class.
Replaced the reference to HoldService

Added Account Blocking DSL definitions to ksa.dsl, provided processing of the Drools global parameters in AccountBlockingServiceImpl class, implemented AccountBlockingServiceTest class, fixed the parameter names in Constants and ksa.dsl, changed ksa_test_data_dml.sql script.

Modified Account Blocking rules to accept collections of ATP IDs, Transaction Type IDs, Hold Issue and Permission names, implemented containsAny() and containsAll() methods in CommonUtils class, made changes to ksa.dsl, AB rules and AccountBlockingServiceTest class, registered Account Blocking JUnit tests with ServiceTestSuite.

Overloaded containsAll() and containsAny() methods with additional arguments in CommonUtils class, provided a delimiter for array values in ksa.dsl, disabled #compress Freemarker directive in a few places to allow correct line breaks, spacing and empty lines on the Rule Management screens.
Updated KsaBill class, created AgedBalance class, changed ObjectFactory and AccountReport classes according to the new XSD changes, modified ksa-type.xsd
Implemented List<ThirdPartyTransferDetail> getThirdPartyTransferDetails(String accountId) method in ThirdPartyTransferService.

Implemented JUnit tests for getThirdPartyTransferDetails() method in ThirdPartyTransferServiceTest class and changed Javadoc comments in ThirdPartyTransferService and ThirdPartyTransferServiceImpl classes.
Added new JUnit tests for AccountBlockingService to AccountBlockingServiceTest class.
Removed deprecated ExternalStatement classes and updated transaction-import.xsd, implemented BillRecord and the new ExternalStatement classes, provided JPA mapping and changed KSA DDL scripts.

Made changes to BillRecord JPA entity according to the new DB schema design, removed a reference to XmlDocument class, created BillRecordService interface, added generateBill() method declaration to ReportService interface, modified ksa_create_ddl.sql and ksa_constraints_ddl.sql scripts.
Optimized transaction management in the KSB Configurer.

Overrode the KRAD View's method index() in KsaFormView class not to re-index the view fields again if it has already been done, optimized transaction management in the following classes: AuditTrailInterceptor, AccessControlServiceImpl, ReportServiceImpl, GenericPersistenceService, BrmPaymentServiceImpl, LoggingInterceptor, InitialParameterConfigurer.
Upgraded KSA to Rice 2.3.1, updated KSA web resources and Maven dependencies. Initial commit for generateBill() method in ReportServiceImpl class, made changes to KsaBill and ObjectFactory classes.

As part of the Rice 2.3.1 upgrade: Updated Freemarker templates and KRAD context in krad-servlet.xml to allow FM custom directives #include and #dyncall, updated Freemarker in pom.xml to 2.3.20-patch2 version.
Restored KsaFormView class due to index() method problem.
Improved error handling and logging in QuickViewController class and removed unused import from QuickViewForm.
Updated KSA-specific header.ftl, view.ftl, fullView.ftl to make the Account Search work. Modified KsaWidgetDefinitions.xml. Refactored GenericSearchController and AccountServiceImpl classes.
Added pager.ftl template

As part of KSA-301 Jira task re-implemented makeEffective() and getGlBreakdowns() methods in TransactionServiceImpl class, corrected the General Ledger test data in ksa_test_data_dml.sql, replaced the reference to DebitType with TransactionType in GlBreakdown JPA entity, refactored TransactionTypeController class.

Continued working on the ReportService methods such as generateBill() and others, re-designed the XML schema, modified ksa-types.xsd and KsaBill class JAXB annotations, moved "latePeriod" property of Account class with setters/getters to ChargeableAccount, made the appropriate changes to AccountManagementController, Account and ChargeableAccount classes, implemented getDeferredAmount(userId, balanceDate) in AccountService.
Implemented getThirdPartyPlansByMember(String accountId) in ThirdPartyTransferService, added a few JUnit tests to ThirdPartyTransferServiceTest class.
Renamed AccountUtil to AccountUtils class, removed @Autowired from AccountUtils class because it would never work, provided basic exception logging.

Implemented makeAllTransactionsEffective() method in TransactionService, made use of it in Batch Transactions and Report Reconciliation controllers instead of the old wrong logic, increased the Tomcat connector's request timeout, disable Tomcat's upload timeout, increased the JTA transaction timeout in @Transactional annotations, created a couple of JUnit tests for makeEffective() and makeAllTransactionsEffective() methods in TransactionServiceTest class.

Refactored the transaction management by splitting long JTA transactions into multiple short ones for transaction import and "makeEffective" functionality, changed several controllers, AccountServiceImpl, GenericPersistenceService, TransactionExportServiceImpl, TransactionImportServiceImpl, TransactionServiceImpl classes. Reimplemented importTransactions() and makeEffective() methods.
Refactored commit() method of GenericPersistenceService class, added logging.
Increased the transaction timeout
Changed the transactionCommitCount value
Bug fixing

Made changes to "db-load-oracle" Maven profile in KSA's pom.xml, moved BRM DML scripts to a new file ksa_load_rules_dml.sql, split SQL scripts into several pieces to make use of "!" statement delimiter in ksa_load_rules_dml.sql, modified ksa_reset_database.sql to make it continue working from SQL Plus console.

Introduced ksa.transaction.batch.enabled and ksa.transaction.batch.size JTA transaction parameters for Big Data processing, added ksa-test.properties file, made "rice.messaging.enabled" parameter database-driven, refactored GenericPersistenceService, TransactionImportServiceImpl, TransactionServiceImpl, KsbConfigurer and InitialParameterConfigurer classes, changed ksa_config_dml.sql
Fixed the JPQL in makeAllTransactionsEffective() method of TransactionServiceImpl class
Enhanced transaction management in TransactionServiceImpl and TransactionImportServiceImpl classes, changed the transaction batch size in KSA properties.
Changed transaction parameters
